Definitions.Paraphrase:
give sth. in return for good and valuable doings
报答，酬谢，奖励
The father rewarded the little boy for cleaning the room. 
小男孩因为打扫了房间而受到父亲的奖励。

1.sth. as a return for good and valuable doings
报答，奖赏
As a reward for passing the exams, she got a new bike from her parents.
她因为通过了考试，父母给她买了一辆新自行车作为奖励。
2.some money given to someone for his good doings 
报酬，酬金
I hear there is a big reward for the seizing of the thief.
我听说为捉拿那小偷设立了重奖。

1. cause sb. to have feelings of disappointment
使沮丧，使灰心
The lack of evidence in this case is frustrating the police.
警方因缺乏证据而感到很伤脑筋。
2. cause the failure of sth. 
使挫败，使受挫折
The bad weather frustrated our hopes of going out. 
坏天气使我们打消了外出的念头。

1. someone who is younger
年少者
He is my junior by several years.
他比我小几岁。
2. someone of low or lower position 
地位较低者，晚辈
She joined the firm a year ago and is a junior partner now. 
她是去年才到公司工作的，现在是我的下属。

1. leading to a practical action 
积极的，肯定的
positive advice 
积极的建议；
positive thinking 
积极的想法
2. sure, having no doubt 
确实的，明确的
It seems unlikely to me, but she seemed very positive. 
这在我看来似乎是不可能的，但她却非常肯定。

较年长者
Students leave middle school at the end of their senior years. 
学生在中学高年级结束之后离校。

of an early period 
在前的，以前的，旧时的
In former times, people were hanged for stealing in Britain.
以前在英国小偷被处以绞刑。

(the ~) the first of the two people or things just mentioned 
前者
Of the two possibilities, the former is more likely.
在两者之中，前者可能性更大。

not like; being different from
不像；和... ...不同
Unlike the north part of China, it is not likely to snow in winter here. 
与中国的北方不一样，这里冬天不太可能下雪。

to frighten by making threats 
恐吓，威胁
They intimidated him into doing what they wanted. 
他们胁迫他干他们要他干的事。

a good moment or chance for doing sth.
机会，时机
He loved music, but because his family was poor, he had no opportunity to take lessons. 
他喜爱音乐，但因家里太穷，他没有机会去学。

连线的, 联网的; 连线地, 联网地
an online course
在线（网络）课程
do some research online 
在网上作研究

the action of sending and exchanging information 
交流，交际；通信
Radio is an important means of communication.
收音机是重要的通讯工具。

a method for giving information 
媒质，媒介物，传导体
TV can be a medium for giving information and opinions.
电视是传递消息和观点的媒体。
Light travels throughout the medium of air.
光通过空气传送。

of middle size, amount, quality 
中等的，适中的
They have a medium-sized house in the heart of the city.
他们在市中心有幢中等大小的房子。
电话，电话机
调制解调器

1. [U] means or right of using, reaching 
接近，进入
The people in the school have access to that computer lab for free. 
在这个学校里的人可以免费使用那间电脑室。
2. means of entering or a way in
通道，入口
That is the only means of access to the building. 
这是通向大楼的惟一通道。

工艺，技术
The use of technology has increased a lot in the last twenty years. 
在最近20年中技术的应用增加了很多。

(in) take part in 
参与，参加
Our teacher often participates in our discussions. 
我们的老师经常参加我们的讨论。

1. 【计】 being produced by the computer but almost true to the reality
虚构的，虚拟的
virtual reality 
虚拟现实
2. almost what is stated 
实质上的，事实上的，实际上的
a virtual certainty 
实际上已肯定的事

1. devotion to 
信奉，献身
The online course would not have succeeded without the commitment of all the teachers. 
没有所有教师全身心的投入，网络课程不会成功。
2. a promise to follow certain beliefs or action 
承诺，许诺，保证
Come and look round our shop without commitment to buy anything. 
请进来看看我们的商店，不一定要买东西。

1. a state of order and control; self control 
纪律; 控制
He did not like the army because of the strict discipline. 
因为纪律太严，他不喜欢军队生活。
It takes a lot of discipline to eat less and lose weight. 
要做到少吃减肥得遵守许多清规戒律。
2. punishment 
惩罚，处分
That child needs discipline! 
这孩子要管教管教!
3. a branch of learning 
学科
She has not yet decided which discipline to study at college. 
她没有决定在大学修哪门学科。

the smallest 
最低的，最小的
The minimum amount of money to open an account (账户) at that bank is ten dollars. 
在那个银行开立账户至少要有十美元。

the smallest amount 
最低限度，最少量
The price is her minimum; she refuses to lower it any more. 
这是她开的最低价，她拒绝再降价。

1.[C] a piece of work given to a particular person
（分派的）任务，（指定的）作业
The teacher asked her students to finish their assignments every day. 
老师要求学生每天完成作业。
2. [U] act of dividing assignments 
分配，指派
the assignment of the work among the students 
在学生中分配任务
笔记簿

make somone feel upset esp. doing sth. not rightly
使窘迫，使尴尬，使不好意思
She was embarrassed when the people laughed at her mistake. 
人们嘲笑她的错误，她感到尴尬。

1. 屏幕，银幕
I used a soft cloth to clean the screen of the television. 
我用软布擦电视机屏幕。
Some of the newer televisions have very large screens. 
有些新电视机的屏幕很大。
2. 屏风，帘，纱窗
A screen separated her bed from the rest of her one-room apartment. 
屏风把她的床与单间公寓的其他部位隔开来。

1. continuing without breaks 
不间断的，不停的
They lived in continual fear. 
他们生活在无休止的恐惧之中。
2. repeated often and over a long period 
多次重复的，频频的
continual requests for improved working conditions 
不断要求改善工作环境

1. 不间断地，不停地
2. 多次重复地，频频地

at last
最后，终于
After several delays, the plane finally left at five o'clock. 
在多次延误之后，飞机终于在5点起飞了。

1. have and enjoy the food or things that happen as a result of work
获得，得到
Now they have come to reap the benefits of our hard work. 
现在他们要来收获我们艰苦劳动的成果了。
2. cut and gather a crop of grain
收割，收获
The women were all out reaping.
妇女们都出去收割庄稼了。

anything that brings help or profit 
益处，好处
Some countries offer new comers many benefits, such as job training and language lessons. 
有些国家对于初来的人提供许多优惠，如工作培训和语言课程。

be useful or helpful to 
有益于
The new teaching plan will benefit many students. 
这个新的教学项目会使许多学生受益。

the power of using one's mind to see or understand the true nature of sth.
洞察力，洞悉，深刻的见解
a man of great insight
富有洞察力的人

文化，文明
Each country has a different culture. That's why it is so exciting to travel in foreign countries. 
每一个国家有不同的文化。这就是到国外旅游使人兴奋之处。

send and exchange feelings, opinions or information 
交流，交际
He is slow in speaking and cannot communicate very well. 
他说话反应慢，交流能力较差。

make (opinions, feelings or information) known or understood by others 
传达，传播
Our teacher communicates his ideas very clearly. 
我们的老师表达思想非常清楚。

most loved 
特别受宠的
Red is my favorite color. I like red more than all of the other colors. 
红色是我最喜欢的颜色。我喜欢红色胜过其他任何颜色。

sth. or someone that is loved above all others
特别喜爱的人（或物）
I like all her books but this is my favorite.
她写的书我都喜欢，但最喜欢这本。

sth. that is done or is being done
活动，行动
People enjoy many different activities in their free time. 
在空余时间，人们有许多休闲活动。

an empty space between two objects
缺口，裂口
That story has too many gaps in it to make sense. 
这个故事脱节的地方太多，意思不完整。
He has a gap between his two front teeth. 
他的两个门牙之间有一缺口。

Vocabularies.Word: be well worth + sth./ doing sth.

Definitions.PartofSpeech:
be something that is rewarding enough to do for the time or effort
值得... ...的
The watch is worth more than the price. 
这表的价值超出标价。
Doing morning exercises is worth the time. 
花点时间做早操是值得的。

不仅... ...而且 ... ...
He plays not only the piano, but also the violin. 
他不仅会弹钢琴，而且会拉小提琴。
Not only is the story interesting to us but also the English is good for us to learn. 
这故事不仅有趣，而且其英语道地，值得一学。

not ... at all; rather than 
一点都不
The short composition is far from perfect. 
这篇作文太糟了。

two or three
两三个
a couple of minutes 
两三分钟

get the right of using or reaching sth. 
可以使用；获得
People living here get access to that swimming pool for free. 
住在这里的人可以免费去那个游泳池。

not to fall behind in; to keep the same speed as
跟上，不落后
The small child had to run in order to keep up with his big brother. 
这小孩为了赶上他哥哥只好跑了起来。

want to do sth. 
想做，想要
I feel like singing/swimming. 
我想去唱歌/游泳。

stop having or doing
停止，放弃
My teacher told me not to give up; I can still pass if I study hard for the final-term exam. 
老师要我不要放弃，只要努力我仍可通过期终考试。

get sth. as a reward
获得益处，得到好处
Only a part of the people has reaped benefits from the new policy. 
只有一部分人从新政策中受益。

meet with
偶然遇上
While I was cleaning the house, I came across some old baby pictures of my father that I had never seen before. 
在打扫房间时，我偶然发现了几张过去从来未见过的，我父亲还是婴儿时的老照片。

exchange... for
用... ... 换
I traded my old car for a new one. 
我把旧车换成了新车。

take part in 
参加
We are expected to participate actively in English class. 
要求我们积极参与英语课的活动。
In high school she participated in several sports. 
在高中时，她参加过好几项运动项目。

because (sth. has happened)
 既然, 由于
Now that you have come, you may stay here. 
你既然来了，就留在这里吧。

communicate with; contact
接触, 联系
Online learning helps us reach out to new friends. 
网络学习使我们结交新朋友。
